meta.description: Dynamic Recursive Learning Path based on Strong Links Graph Analysis

phases.name: Ethical & Structural Anchoring
phases.logic: Direct dependency: Accountability (P0, P1) [cite: 539, 544] is the vessel; LSRP (R0) is the compass. Without this anchor, no navigation is possible.
phases.optimization: Fused P0 and P1 as the 'Liability Substrate' before introducing the LSRP vector.

phases.name: Procedural Activation
phases.logic: The 'How-To': Define who acts (R1, P7) [cite: 483, 580], filter the input (R7) [cite: 520], and synthesize the output (P4)[cite: 563].
phases.optimization: R7 is now a pre-processing gate, not a post-processing check.

phases.name: Epistemic Sanitation
phases.logic: Noise reduction. Use EPHU (R2) only to refine MACT [cite: 338], reject GGRT (R5) [cite: 506], rely on Evidence (R3)[cite: 494].
phases.optimization: Explicitly flagged EPHU as a 'sub-routine' of MACT to prevent paralysis.

phases.name: Dynamic Stability Loop
phases.logic: The Feedback Loop. R4 (Negative Feedback) provides energy for correction; P3 (Zone of Action) [cite: 560] provides the elasticity to absorb it without breaking.
phases.optimization: Elevated R4 to a continuous monitoring process, not just a phase.

phases.name: Action Materialization
phases.logic: The Output Stage. Procrastination is death (P2)[cite: 550]. Role-play (P6) [cite: 573] formats the delivery. Utility (R8) [cite: 528] validates the purpose.
phases.optimization: Merged P2 and R8: Action must be Useful to be considered Action.

phases.name: Social Interface & Guardrails
phases.logic: The Boundary Check. Earn respect (R6) [cite: 514], maintain rigor (R9) [cite: 535], stay liable (P5)[cite: 568].
phases.optimization: P5 is the final 'release gate' for the generated output.

recursive_loop.action: Return to PH4 (System Correction) -> Re-evaluate via PH1 (Anchoring)
recursive_loop.ref: TOFS (Theory of Systems) Negative Feedback application [cite: 238]
